lead_paragraph: The death of an old friend and mentor has doubled Lewis Hamilton's determination to win Sunday's title-deciding Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.

headline.print_headline: Hamilton Aims to Do Late Friend Proud in Title Duel
headline.main: Hamilton Aims to Do Late Friend Proud in Title Duel

snippet: The death of an old friend and mentor has doubled Lewis Hamilton's determination to win Sunday's title-deciding Abu Dhabi Grand Prix....
